text: Jan Karol Tarło (c. 1593-1645) was a Polish–Lithuanian noble (szlachcic). Son of starost Stanisław Tarło and Barbara Dulska. Married to Marianna Ligęza c. 1636. He was castellan of Wiślice and starost of Olsztyn and Zwoleń. His daughter Barbara married the powerful magnate Hetman Jerzy Sebastian Lubomirski. Category:1590s births Category:1645 deaths Jan Karol
title: Jan Karol Tarło
